verses.text: \w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* affliction \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rise early \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Come|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H6965"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* heal \w us|strong="H6440"\w*: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* strike, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* cure \w us|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* revive \w us|strong="H3384"\w* \w after|strong="H0776"\w* two days: \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* third \w day|strong="H7837"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* raise \w us|strong="H3384"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* live \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* sight. \w We|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* light, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w us|strong="H3384"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* early \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w latter|strong="H4456"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H1242"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*? \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H1242"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* Juda? \w your|strong="H4100"\w* mercy \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H1980"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w that|strong="H1242"\w* goeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w reason|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w hewed|strong="H2672"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w and|strong="H4941"\w* thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H5030"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w desired|strong="H2654"\w* mercy, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* holocausts.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w*, \w like|strong="H8033"\w* \w Adam|strong="H0121"\w*, have transgressed \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* have \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w dealt|strong="H0898"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* against me.

Galaad \w is|strong="H1818"\w* \w a|strong="H6466"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* idols, supplanted \w with|strong="H1568"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* jaws \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w highway|strong="H1870"\w* robbers, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* conspire \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w murder|strong="H7523"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* pass \w out|strong="H0376"\w* Sichem: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* wrought \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* horrible thing \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fornications \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, O Juda, \w set|strong="H7896"\w* thee \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* \w of|strong="H7622"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
